author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The goal of this PR is mostly to calibrate the ranges of the MEs introduced in PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40295 after analyzing the 2022 HI Test run data.

#### PR validation:

Run this branch using the following modifications on top: https://gist.github.com/mmusich/bccffd6294eacd75a7d74c61e11a7e34

and then running 
```
 cmsRun DQM/Integration/python/clients/sistrip_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py runkey=hi_run
```

The resulting DQM file is available at: https://cernbox.cern.ch/s/trAIVAsxgYauCrm

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: update `SiStripMonitorApproximateCluster` ME ranges
